## Figure S1

Fitted model convergence metrics for the Beta, Omega and Gamma parameters of the HMSC model. Effective Sample Size (ESS) over 1000 indicate good fit, while Potential Scale Reduction Factors (PSRF) values of under 1.1 (though ideally 1.01) are considered converged for MCMC sampling.
